SEARCH
Package com.fortisbank.contracts.models.accounts

Interface InterestBearingAccount

All Known Implementing Classes:
CreditAccount, SavingsAccount
public interface InterestBearingAccount
Interface representing an interest-bearing account.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    BigDecimal
    getInterestRate()
    Returns the interest rate applied to the account.
    LocalDate
    getLastInterestApplied()
    Returns the date when interest was last applied to the account.
    boolean
    isEligibleForInterestCalculation()
    Checks if the account is eligible for interest calculation.
    void
    setLastInterestApplied(LocalDate date)
    Sets the date when interest was last applied to the account.

  • Method Details

    • getInterestRate

      BigDecimal getInterestRate()
      Returns the interest rate applied to the account. The interest rate can represent an annual or monthly rate.
      Returns:
      the interest rate

    • getLastInterestApplied

      LocalDate getLastInterestApplied()
      Returns the date when interest was last applied to the account.
      Returns:
      the last interest applied date

    • setLastInterestApplied

      void setLastInterestApplied(LocalDate date)
      Sets the date when interest was last applied to the account.
      Parameters:
      date - the date to set

    • isEligibleForInterestCalculation

      boolean isEligibleForInterestCalculation()
      Checks if the account is eligible for interest calculation.
      Returns:
      true if eligible for interest calculation, false otherwise
